summary: Patch that adds a simple and immersive way to give Animated Dragon Wings to yourself or your followers by way of enchanting an item for them to equip.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a patch for Anton0028's Animated Dragon Wings. It comes from my desire to have my followers (specifically my scale-brother Derkeethus) have dragon wings like I do.Â I know there is already a way to enchant a ring with the magic effect via console, but I wanted something a little more immersive and permanent. I created this patch which allows the player to make a set of rings with an enchantment version of Anton's wings spell effect. There is 1 ring for each of the different effects and they are used simply by equipping/unequippng the rings. This also works on followers and the effect can be dis-enchanted and put on any other piece of armor/jewelry. Furthermore, if the wings ever disappear off of a follower, you can simple take and give back the object to get the wings to reappear.

----Requirements----
Anton0028's Animated Dragon Wings found [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/?]here[/url].

----Installation----
Simply copy the DragonWingRings.esp to your Data directory and enable it in your favorite Mod Manager (I use WryeBash);

----Load Order----
Make sure this mod is loaded AFTER Animated Dragon Wings.

----Uninstall----
This *Should* uninstall cleanly by simply deleting the esp. However, I have not tested this as once I created it I have NEVER turned it off =P)

----Other----
Also check out my similar mod called [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87885/?]FairyWingRings[/url].
author: Skyrimfan5
